description: Autonomous AI copywriter for wallet-to-social content marketing. Ralph creates blog posts, case studies, social content, and newsletters to promote the wallet-to-social resolution tool.

userStories.title: Initialize database and verify setup
userStories.description: Set up the content database with wallet-to-social seed data
acceptanceCriteria: Run npm run ralph:reset to initialize database
Run npm run ralph:status shows trends, research, and communications
Run npm run ralph:test passes all checks
userStories.notes: Foundation story - database must exist before content work begins

userStories.title: Create content plan for Farcaster integration launch
userStories.description: Review COMM-1 (Farcaster Integration) and create a comprehensive blog post plan
acceptanceCriteria: Create content plan entry in database with type 'blog'
Include Web3/crypto keywords in the plan
userStories.notes: Farcaster is hot right now. This is a timely announcement.

userStories.title: Write Farcaster integration announcement blog
userStories.description: Write the first draft announcing Farcaster support in wallet-to-social
acceptanceCriteria: Create draft in drafts table linked to plan
Includes all key messages from the communication
Explains why Farcaster matters for wallet identity
userStories.notes: Tone: Excited but technical. Speak to Web3 builders.

userStories.title: Plan thought leadership on wallet identity trends
userStories.description: Use TREND-1 (Farcaster Growth) and RESEARCH-1 (Match Rate Benchmarks) for a thought leadership piece
acceptanceCriteria: Read trend id=1 and research id=1 from database
Create content plan entry with type 'blog'
Link to both trend and research
Title should capture the wallet identity thesis
Include 5+ SEO keywords for Web3 identity
userStories.notes: Position wallet-to-social as THE solution for the wallet identity problem

userStories.title: Write thought leadership on wallet identity
userStories.description: Write a data-driven blog post about why wallets are becoming social profiles
acceptanceCriteria: Incorporates match rate data from research
Explains the problem token projects face
userStories.notes: This is the flagship content piece. Make it shareable.

userStories.title: Review and improve Farcaster launch blog
userStories.description: Self-review the Farcaster announcement, improve it, add meta description
userStories.notes: Be critical. Strengthen the hook and CTAs.

userStories.title: Finalize and publish Farcaster launch blog
userStories.description: Final edits and publish the Farcaster integration announcement

userStories.title: Plan DAO governance case study
userStories.description: Create content plan for the DAO governance case study (COMM-2)
userStories.notes: Case studies are high-converting. Focus on the 4x governance improvement.

userStories.title: Write DAO governance case study
userStories.description: Write a compelling case study showing how a DAO increased participation
acceptanceCriteria: Explain how wallet-to-social enabled direct outreach
Include placeholder quotes from DAO leaders

userStories.title: Create social media content batch
acceptanceCriteria: Write 5 distinct posts with different angles
Mix of product, educational, and engagement posts
userStories.notes: Vary the angles: problem/solution, data point, question, testimonial style

userStories.title: Draft launch newsletter
userStories.description: Create a newsletter announcing the Farcaster integration and sharing trends
userStories.notes: Newsletter should provide value beyond just product news

userStories.title: Log final content metrics and learnings
userStories.description: Review all work done, log metrics, document what worked
acceptanceCriteria: Document effective patterns for Web3 audience
All tests pass: npm run ralph:test
userStories.notes: Final story - capture learnings for future content sprints
